factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

properties.description:
Copy files of any size from SharePoint  to Data Lake, including copy all files matching a startswith condition of a folder and files modified in the last x hours.

To use this pipeline you need to have the sharepoint client id and secret id registered in the dedicated sharepoint key vault

To use this pipeline you need to have the sharepoint client id and secret id registered in the dedicated sharepoint key vault

Direct copy of sharepoint file to datalake

To use this pipeline you need to have the sharepoint client id and secret id registered in the dedicated sharepoint key vault
